1.0.6.name: wordpress/paste-json-text
1.0.6.description:
JSON text widget add to the admin post/page editor. A post contant is changed into a JSON text, and paste to the other editor.

Some features:

  • A post content is changed into a JSON text(include: title, content, post-name, categories, post-tags, meta values).
  • A JSON text is pasted to the admin post/page editor.

Support

  • Japanese - http://elearn.jp/wpman/column/paste-json-text.html

Translators

  • Japanese(ja) - Takenori Matsuura

You can send your own language pack to me.

Please contact to me.

  • http://12net.jp/ (ja)
  • @tmatsuur on twitter.

Contributors

  • Takenori Matsuura
